captions.text:
He's from Spain, so, Red Bull
brought him back out of retirement

pretty much from the rally to come out
to this year's RC.

Right here, Carlos.
He's kind of a man, I'm just going --
I don't want to interrupt.

My name is Travis Pastrana.
This is my wife.
This is where I'm going.
And this is my story.
On Pace with Pastrana, Season 2
Barcelona, Spain.

Barcelona is such an awesome city.
I mean, the culture here, so much history.

The X Games is going to blow.
And the best of the best are here.

So I'm excited that we get to perform 
in front all these Spaniards,
Because these guys are nuts.

We're up here. The X Games is actually
just down the hill. Still overseeing

most of the city here, Barcelona.
Kill some down time, where the track
is completely covered in water.
Fire one, ready.

Crago over here, went from like,
full awesome balanced athlete

-to "I need a hand getting down from"
-Well, I'm very clumsy. I could easily slip

and before it was on me, but now it's
your kid I would be squashing.
Alright, good call.

Well, we're here at BMX Berg, here
to watch a bunch of our friends compete.

well, I'm here to watch them compete.
Travis is here to try to recruit dudes
for the nude beach tomorrow.
It's a family photo.

One of the most important key factors
in any athlete is having passion

for what you do, and I can't think of one
person that's more passionate than Travis

about competition in general.
In action sports as a whole,

has been so pushed forward because
of everything he's done.

And he has such a personality and presence 
at these events, we just need him around.

[Cheers] He just did three 
best tricks in one run.

The course is completely under water
yesterday, they used a lot of lime.

Hopefully it's going to be somewhat 
okay, we got the freestyle guys,

we're going to try to use it today.
Hopefully we get this race off.

Rally cross doesn't get 
to compete until Sunday.

Not until almost noon tomorrow
where we actually get to test the cars.

So we get several days of wrenching around,
but we test the cars, we practice,

we qualify we race. All in one.
We got these massive rainclouds coming over.

If any one of these rain clouds dump 
on that stadium, then we're going
to have a mud cross tomorrow.

So we're headed to the enduro-cross course
to watch Jolene Van Vugt and Tara Tigaer race.

And then they get to tear the whole
course down and tomorrow,

we're actually going out there
and race & rally.

It's pretty cool to see Travis still here,
you know, I mean, the guy had such

a huge impact on starting the sport for us,
so, just seeing he's still around

and seeing his face around, you know,
people see that, I'm sure everybody
is just hopped on it, you know.

-So how's your whip?
-My whip is the best.

-Edgar Torronteras
-Yea, banana face.

Rally cross is the last event on the last day.
And it is two o'clock in the afternoon.

What have happened was the bridge
actually collapsed when Hubert and

one of his buddies was bulldozing 
try to get the jump all set.

So they have to redesign the entire course
this morning. We're ready to get out there

with absolutely no practice, jump straight
into seeding, straight into qualifying,
live TV, and give her hell.

Over here in Barcelona, it's a pretty
surreal experience.

Maybe sit here, I think we've moved back
a little bit, it's four thirty, we're supposed

to start out practice for the last time
at four. There's going to be

no practice, straight to seeding.
You have five minutes, basically,

they're going to put three groups of
everyone out there.

Bryce was the only one that made
a lap out there. They pulled all the

drivers back in, but the track is
pretty much mudfest, so.

No, there is no reason to send --
we're not going to be the only two

cars out there driving on the track
before everyone else, breaking our stuff.
What's going on out there?

Game Over, they're clipped.
Travis has already hit the wall.
I think on his first lap.

It's still raining, they just officially 
closed down the race, of the GRC.

What I was looking out here. This guys's
got a Marilyn 199 shirt.
Look at this right here. Yea!
[Crowd] Travis! Travis! Travis!

On the next episode of On Pace with Pastrana,
Check out my new car, my new team.
Roush Fenway Racing.

title: On Pace w/ Pastrana - Spain Storms at X Games - S02E02
